segments.text: The kitchen looks so ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman at the sink, towel in hand, polishing away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's running, basin full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades over, pooling on the floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the stool, arm extended to the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookie jar brimming with treats inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby, palm up in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains pulled back, garden visible through the panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are spread unevenly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands with one foot in the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This sneaky cookie grab is kind of amusing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water damage worries me a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR
